there ya go... and tony.. I don't want to hear it busta!! anyway.... For some reason I'm feeling hyper as hell right now. I was almost dieing of sleep at work today but now I can't sleep!! OoOh.. I went and saw Coach Carter last week. I liked it.. dunno why so many people hate it. I have to admit.. never thought I would say this.. but that white kid was kinda cute .. he must be mixed!! LOL And since when did the kid from One on One get a body like that? NICE!! So anyway.. the movie.. I like it except for Ashanti.. I'm not "hating" on the girl.. she wasn't bad.. I just didn't really see a reason for her in the movie.. and I really didn't like the whole abortion issue.. but whatever.. it is based on a true story so they did what they had to do.. One of the previews I saw when I went to the theaters was the preview for the next XXX movie.. and NO not a XXX rated movie, I'm talking about the next Triple X Movie. I was disappointed when I heard Vin Diesel wasn't in it but Ice Cube looked like he did a good job.. and he brought a lil westcoast flavor to the movie.. plus I Ice Cube! Now I have to go see Are We There Yet. OoOoOh.. I also saw the previews for Vin Diesels movie.. Pacifier .. that shish looked funny as hell!! hmmm.. I have sOo much to say but I must go now.. PEACE!!

HAPPY NEW YEAR PEOPLE!!!!!!!

i hope all you bustas brought in the new year safely!!
im sittin here listenin Mario's song.. is it just me or does Mario look like a young version of Chris Rock? LOL serio.. aight, i'm not about to sit here and summarize all that's happened these past months.. so lets forward and pause at the present. so much is on my mind right about now .. the main thing is guys.. what else! I feel like im stuck between a rock and a hard place ya know? lets break it down.. There are these three guys.. lets call them A, B, and C. A & B are best friends who grew up together and i've known them for about 4-5 years. A & B have known C for about 3 years. I've known C for 2 months. Ever since I've known A he has always told me how much he likes me and how I should give him a chance.. I would.. except he has a girl.. whom he has always said he would drop for me lol thats some sad shish. Last week C came up to me saying he wants to get to know me better and start dating.. the thing is C is pretty shy and never really said much before this day so I really don't know much about him.. so I decided to go to B to see what he thought about me and C going out. The reason I went to B is because I thought that A would just try to make C look bad since he has been tryin to get at me for 5 years lol. so anyway.. I was over B place tonight and when I told him about C he looked a lil upset and didnt say anything. after what seemed to be 4546764614687 minutes of silence I asked wtf was the problem. he said he was pissed at the thought that I would go out with C before ever going out with him.. I was like WTF where did this come from?!. come to find out B has had a crush on me forever but never said anything since his best friend A was always trying to hook up with me. now I have no idea what to do.. B is mad sweet.. he has always been there for me.. we have a lot in common.. BUT he feels uncomfortable because of A.. then theres C who is shy as hell but had the guts to approach me. WTF should i do.. anyway.. time to go..
WoOoOoOo... its been forever and a day since I've updated this lol... ...and it will probably be a long ass time until I do update this... ...or maybe not... bbl... =D

damn.. haven't updated in about 2 months lol. life's been kinda hectic lately.. i was suppose to be back home by the end of february.. BUT we are now in the middle of march and i'm still here .. soOo what's been up? oOoH yea.. valentines day.. feb. 14.. i walked into my office at work and found 4 dozen long stem roses with 4 huge "I Luv U" balloons from none other than Dominic . i was surprised as hell.. it made my day. but tell me why all the females started calling up their men asking where the hell their flowers were.. . sOo then i called him up to say thanks and all that. after work i headed out to where im staying at.. a few co-workers called me up to ask me if i wanted to go out with them but i they were all couples so I said no.. didnt feel like being the only person without somebody there lol. an hour later somebody knocked on my door .. it was Dom.. with more roses.. .. he knows nothing about Cali but he drove himself down here just to visit me.. how cute is that? anyway.. time to get myself some sleep.. i'll update this tomorrow..

sOoOo.. my mom sent me these in an email and i couldn't stop laughing .. read them.. don't be lazy and just skim through them ::smh::.. 1) A kindergarten pupil told his teacher he'd found a cat, but it was dead. "How do you know that the cat was dead?" she asked her pupil. "Because I pissed in its ear and it didn't move." answered the child innocently. "You did WHAT?" the teacher exclaimed in surprise. "You know," explained the boy, "I leaned over and went 'Pssssssst!' and it didn't move."
2) A small boy is sent to bed by his father. Five minutes later..... "Da-ad..." "What?" "I'm thirsty. Can you bring me a drink of water?" "No, You had your chance. Lights out." Five minutes later: "Da-aaaaad...." "WHAT?" "I'm THIRSTY. Can I have a drink of water??" "I told you NO! If you ask again, I'll have to spank you!!" Five minutes later... "Daaaaa-aaaaaaad..." "WHAT!" "When you come in to spank me, can you bring me a drink of water?"
3) An exasperated mother, whose son was always getting into mischief, finally asked him "How do you expect to get into Heaven?" The boy thought it over and said, "Well, I'll run in and out and in and out and keep slamming the door until St. Peter says, 'For Heaven's sake, Dylan, come in or stay out!'"
4) One summer evening during a violent thunderstorm a mother was tucking her son into bed. She was about to turn off the light when he asked with a tremor in his voice, "Mommy, will you sleep with me tonight?" The mother smiled and gave him a reassuring hug. "I can't dear," she said. "I have to sleep in Daddy's room." A long silence was broken at last by his shaky little voice: "The big sissy."
5) It was that time, during the Sunday morning service, for the children's sermon. all the children were invited to come forward. One little girl was wearing a particularly pretty dress and , as she sat down, the pastor leaned over and said, "That is a very pretty dress. Is it your Easter Dress?" the little girl replied, directly into the pastor's clip on microphone, "Yes, and my Mom says it's a bitch to iron."
6) When I was six months pregnant with my third child, my three year old came into the room when I was getting ready to get into the shower. She said, "Mommy, you are getting fat!" I replied, "Yes honey, remember Mommy has a baby growing in her tummy." "I know," she replied, "but what's growing in your butt?"
7) A little boy was doing his math homework. He said to himself, "Two plus five, that son of a bitch is seven. three plus six, that son of a bitch is nine..." His mother heard what he was saying and gasped, "What are you doing?" The little boy answered, "I'm doing my math homework, Mom." "And this is how your teacher taught you to do it?" the mother asked. "Yes," he answered. Infuriated, the mother asked the teacher the next day, "What are you teaching my son in math?" The teacher replied, "Right now, we are learning addition." The mother asked, "And are you teaching them to say two plus two, that son of a bitch is four?" After the teacher stopped laughing, she answered, "What I taught them was, two plus two, THE SUM OF WHICH, is four."
8) One day the first grade teacher was reading the story of Chicken Little to her class. She came to the part of the story where Chicken Little tried to warn the farmer. She read, "...and so the Chicken Little went up to the farmer and said, 'The sky is falling, the sky is falling!'" The teacher paused then asked the class, "And what do you think that farmer said?" One little girl raised her hand and said, "I think he said: 'Holy Shit! A talking chicken!'" The teacher was unable to teach for the next 10 minutes.
9) A certain little girl, when asked her name, would reply, "I'm Mr. Sugarbrown's daughter." Her mother told her this was wrong, she must say, "I'm Jane Sugarbrown." The Vicar spoke to her in Sunday School, and said, "Aren't you Mr. Sugarbrown's daughter?" She replied, "I thought I was, but my mother says I'm not."
10) A little girl asked her mother, "Can I go outside and play with the boys?" Her mother replied, "No, you can't play with the boys, they're too rough." The little girl thought about it for a few moments and asked, "If I can find a smooth one, can I play with him?"
11) A little girl goes to the barber shop with her father. She stands next to the barber chair, while her dad gets his hair cut, eating a snack cake. The barber says to her, "Sweetheart, you're gonna get hair on your Twinkie." She says, "Yes, I know, and I'm gonna get boobs too."

i just got back from kicking it with Dominic (the newyorican), his brother and his brothers girl.. we spent the whole day just talking about things .. i was suppose to show them around the city but by the time we looked at the clock it was already 2am lol. soOo anyway.. what else is new.. i also made Dominic get one .. but i know they'll both be like everyone else i've brought to LJ.. they post once and are never heard from again .. damn bustas ..

today Jess and I headed out to Stonestown to do some shopping.. i bumped into this guy.. when i saw him my face went: lol.. the boy was looking NICE.. nice skin tone.. hazel eyes.. nice lips.. a big koolaide smile and dimples.. damn.. i'm a sucka for dimples too.. and when he spoke spanish he had the whole newyorican accent.. whoa.. too damn kayoooooooooot .. anyway.. i just got off the phone with him ..
tell me this isn't funny.. TELL ME..

Happy New Year to all you bustas!!!!!

Hope you all had fun on New Years Eve.. i heard some of you were waiting on me at Tony's place.. LMAOoOoOo my bad.. maybe i should've called?! i swear i had planned to stop by after 1am but then i completely forgot.. sorry .. but i heard Choli took my place as entertainer for the night anyway .. i decided to go to a lil get-together with my Mom.. my lil sisters.. and a few ex-co-workers at my ex-operations managers place.. it was nice and quiet.. had myself a couple of jello shots.. some rum and coke.. some hypno not too much though.. i had to drive home and survive. we played some game named Battle of the Sexes and YOU KNOW us women won right? .. that game has some crazy ass questions though.. then we spent the rest of the night clowning the hell outta people . sOoOo anyway.. what's new?.. nada much.. oh yea.. i got this note on migente yesterday.. i couldnt stop laughing .. this guy told me he had seen me on hella females pages bitching about thier men talking to me.. i was like WTF lmao i barely ever talk to peoples off of there.. must be some other girl.. i have hella shish to add to this but uh.. not right now.. gotta bounce so i'll be back later..
Just want to wish all you bastids

Take the What High School Stereotype Are You? quiz.
WTF?! ::smh:: no comment.. anyway.. so i'm out of school for vacation until next year. now it feels like i have too much time on my hands.. im use to being busy 24/7. my usual schedule consists of waking up at 5:00am to get ready for school .. leaving the house at 7:00am .. starting school at 9:00am .. leaving school at 2:00pm .. starting work at 2:30pm .. leaving work at 11:00pm .. getting home at 12:00am .. trying to do my homework and end up falling asleep at 2:00am only to wake back up at 5:00am to start over my schedule. what to do.. what to do.. damn! it's already dec. 23rd and i have yet to go christmas shopping for my family and friends.. other than my parents.. i heard the 99 cent store has nice gifts .. it's the thought that counts right?

I get 46546465464 bustas complaining that I don't update this as much as I should but WTF.. you all don't comment.. so you're all just sitting there being nosey as hell reading about what I do? smh ::trows rocks at ya bastids:: so anyway.. it' 3:35am and I'm awake.. just reading my notes on MiGente.. (by the way.. if you're not a member of migente yet.. here you go:
...let them know guera sent you.. ) migente is pure comedy.. you get notes from complete strangers confessing their love for you just because they read your page and saw your pics .. unbelievable. then you get one word notes that just say ::.holla.:: (the word alone annoys the sh!t out of me) so you decided to be nice and check their page out before you ignore them and you realize their page is just as empty as the note they sent.. why am i going to waste my time trying to ::.holla.:: and someone with no depth? .. they make me want to be able to jump out their screen and punch the sh!t out of them . OoOh.. and you can't forget about the people who send you a ::.a/s/l.:: note.. wtf.. are you serious??!! migente is not AOL. i mean.. i understand people not wanting to read peoples life stories on their page but the A/S/L is located on everyones page.. right on the left side.. so sO SO simple.. okay.. i think this is enough of me ranting for right now.. time for me to head to my bed and try to get some sleep in this freezing weather .. it's a damn shame i have nobody here to keep me warm j/k ya damn freaks ::SMH:: i'll be back.. bYe peoples!!!!!!!
lol damn.. i haven't been keeping up with this journal.. time for me to delete some old entries and start over.. i'll be back later.

I forgot I had this website.. it's been almost one year since I hit this up so lets see what boring stuff I've been up to.. Relocation- I'm living in Antioch now.. I have to admit.. it's a nice ass house.. it was the model house so all the rooms were already painted and decorated and you know I had to pick the best room with a walk-in closet right? The neighborhood is quiet as hell and everybody that lives here seems to be either over 45 yrs old or under 17 yrs old.. no in between. And the 17 and under get on my last nerve.. here's why: So my lil sister is going to Deer Valley High.. a good ass school with many opportunities and a huge selection of classes.. the average test scores of that school are high and it's in the top rank of Cali high schools.. all these kids are spoiled as hell with no jobs.. driving 2003 cars that their mommy or daddy bought them.. none of the students have probably even stepped foot in a ghetto.. so tell me why the hell they act like they've lived a hard knock life?!?!?! there are kids claiming they belong to gangs.. GANGS IN ANTIOCH? LMFAOoOoOoOoOoOoOo oh man that some funny stuff.. they try so hard to act hard core and grown which annoys the hell outta me. Anyway.. there is absolutly nothing to do here. The only time you see people here after 10PM is on Friday and Saturday at the Theater by Deer Valley. The only other place to see people in antioch is at County East Mall.. a small ass 1 level mall.. OoOh and one more thing about Antioch.. ITS HOT AS HELL.. everyday and night it's over 100 degrees!! But eyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyz.. i'm not one to complain.. =] Work- So I obviously left Sears in San Bruno and began working at Washington Mutual as soon as I moved. Managers there were on a powertrip on a daily basis so I had to leave. I went back to working my ass off for Marriott. Aight.. it's time for me to head out to work so I'll be updating this later..

hmm damn.. i havent written in a long ass time so where do i start? antonio - yea.. so umm we broke up a week after my last entry. he said i was starting to act as if i only wanted to be friends which was kinda true but it still came as a surprise. he's still my boy though.. love him to death. *muahs* moving - OMG i dunno wtf imma do. so as you know.. i moved out of san fran and into hercules and next week we moving to antioch. WTF am i going to do in Antioch? that place is dead as hell.. nothing ever happens there meaning im still going to be driving my ass down to san fran on a daily basis to see whats poppin. guys - WTF??????????? are there any real guys out there? cause all i run into are the frontin playa wannabes..
